verbose_text: Following activation of class I PI3Ks, Akt and one of its upstream protein kinases termed PDK1 (phosphoinositide dependent kinase 1) are recruited to the plasma membrane via their PtdIns (3,4,5) P 3 / PtdIns (3,4) P 2 -binding PH domains.
evidence: class I PI3Ks, Akt and one of its upstream protein kinases termed PDK1 (phosphoinositide-dependent kinase 1) are recruited to the plasma membrane
